languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс деловито обшаривает труп зари, словно ищет что-то конкретное. Проверив каждый ремень и подсумок, он с раздраженным вздохом выпрямляется, бросает взгляд на изуродованный когитатор — и решительно направляется к нему.{/n} "Я нашел, что искал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс деловито обшаривает труп зари, словно ищет что-то конкретное. Проверив каждый ремень и подсумок, он с раздраженным вздохом выпрямляется, бросает взгляд на изуродованный когитатор — и решительно направляется к нему.{/n} "Я нашел, что искал".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс деловито обшаривает труп зари, словно ищет что-то конкретное. Проверив каждый ремень и подсумок, он с раздраженным вздохом выпрямляется, бросает взгляд на изуродованный когитатор — и решительно направляется к нему.{/n} "Я нашел, что искал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix searches Aurora's corpse in a no-nonsense manner, as if he's looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks towards it in a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

{n}Heinrix searches Aurora's corpse in a no-nonsense manner, as if he's looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks towards it in a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

{n}Heinrix busily searches Aurora's corpse, as if he's looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it in a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

{n}Heinrix busily searches Aurora's corpse, as if he's looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it in a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

{n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

{n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix durchsucht Auroras Leiche, als würde er nach etwas Bestimmtem suchen. Nachdem er jeden Gürtel und jede Tasche durchsucht hat, richtet er sich mit einem verärgerten Seufzen auf, blickt auf den entstellten Cogitator und marschiert resolut darauf zu.{/n} "Ich habe gefunden, wonach ich suche."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix durchsucht eifrig Auroras Leiche, als würde er nach etwas Bestimmtem suchen. Nachdem er jeden Gürtel und jede Tasche durchsucht hat, richtet er sich mit einem verärgerten Seufzen auf, blickt auf den entstellten Cogitator und marschiert resolut darauf zu.{/n} "Ich habe gefunden, wonach ich suche."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'affaire méthodiquement à inspecter le cadavre d'Aurore, comme s'il y cherchait quelque chose de précis. Après avoir fouillé chaque poche et cachette potentielle, il se redresse en poussant un soupir contrarié, jette un regard au cogitateur brisé et se dirige dans sa direction d'un pas résolu.{/n} « Ah, voilà ce que je cherchais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'affaire à fouiller le cadavre d'Aurore, comme s'il y cherchait quelque chose de précis. Après avoir fouillé chaque poche et cachette potentielle, il se redresse en poussant un soupir contrarié, jette un regard au cogitateur brisé et se dirige dans sa direction d'un pas résolu.{/n} « Ah, voilà ce que je cherchais. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希有条不紊地搜索着“极光”的尸体，似乎在寻找某件特别的东西。检查完腰带和所有的口袋之后，他懊恼地叹了口气，直起身，看了看那台已经残破不堪的沉思者，随后果断地大步走了过去。{/n}“我找到了一直在找的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希匆匆搜索着奥罗拉的尸体，似乎在寻找某件特别的东西。检查完腰带和所有的口袋之后，他懊恼地叹了口气，直起身，看了看那台已经残破不堪的思考器，随后果断地大步走了过去。{/n}“我找到了一直在找的东西。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは何か目当てのものを探しているかのように、オーロラの死体を手際よく調べ始めた。ベルトとポーチを全て確認し、イラついたようにため息を吐いて立ち上がる。めちゃくちゃになった考算機をチラリと見ると、ズカズカとその方向へ足を進めた。{/n}「探しものが見つかったよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは何か目当てのものを探しているかのように、オーロラの死体を忙しなく調べ始めた。ベルトとポーチを全て確認して、イラつきながらため息を吐いて立ち上がる。めちゃくちゃになった考算機をチラリと見ると、ズカズカとその方向へ足を進めた。{/n}「探していたものを見つけたよ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix registra concienzudamente el cadáver de Aurora, como si buscara algo en concreto. Tras comprobar todos los cinturones y bolsas, se levanta con un suspiro de fastidio, echa un vistazo al cogitador destrozado y camina hacia él con paso firme.{/n} «He encontrado lo que buscaba».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix registra minuciosamente el cadáver de Aurora, como si buscara algo en concreto. Tras comprobar todos los cinturones y bolsas, se levanta con un suspiro de fastidio, echa un vistazo al cogitador destrozado y camina hacia él con paso firme.{/n} «He encontrado lo que buscaba».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bilhassa bir şey peşindeymiş gibi Aurora'nın cesedini arıyor. Her bir cebi ve kemeri kontrol ettikten sonra canı sıkkın bir iç çekerek doğruluyor. Mahvolmuş kavramsayara bir bakış atıyor, kararlı ve uzun adımlarla cihaza yöneliyor.{/n} "Aradığımı buldum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix efficiently searches Aurora's corpse as if he is looking for something specific. After checking every belt and pouch, he straightens up with an annoyed sigh, glances at the mangled cogitator, and walks toward it with a resolute stride.{/n} "I've found what I've been looking for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, özel bir şeyin peşindeymiş gibi Aurora'nın cesedini arıyor. Her bir cebi ve kemeri kontrol ettikten sonra öfkeyle nefesini vererek doğruluyor. Mahvolmuş kavramsayara bakıyor ve kararlı adımlarla cihaza yöneliyor.{/n} "Aradığımı buldum."
